description: Transfigured is a 2D side-scroller psychological horror game. Humanoid monstrosities stalk you from the dark. Armed with nothing other than a dying flashlight, survival depends on hiding, finding tools, and carefully navigating your surroundings.

name: Typing Simulator
description: Typing Simulator is not a game, it's the future. Learn to type. Get fast. High scores, leader-boards and speed running, all in VR.

name: Troubadours
description: Troubadours is a management simulation game where you lead a troop of artists in a fantastic medieval world. Provide food and shelter, manage all sorts of musical acts, and play their performances. You also deal with the countless situations generated by their colorful personalities.

name: Veilslash
description: In this action adventure, generate and phase terrain with various tools. Carry a massive communication device to the apex of an alien planet, but don't drop it. It's a long way down...

name: Vector Bias
description: Pilot your Vector through hostile procedurally generated environments in this fast-paced action-roguelite. Battle enemies and conquer bosses to reach the heart of the robotic army that has subjugated the earth. Good luck!

name: Van Life Simulator
description: Get ready for Camping & Vanlife adventure in Van Life Simulator! Dive into the ultimate mobile lifestyle, renovate iconic vans, and craft your own masterpiece. Hit the road, explore open-world landscapes, face wild challenges, and live the dream in the freedom of van life and camping.

name: Uncovered: 1945
description: Immerse yourself in an exiting World War II Story about Hitler Secret Bunker and what does he leave behind, Get ready for a new Jurney of exploration and Uncover the Secrets of the bunkers. Will you be able to succeed?

name: Wake Up: Liminal
description: How far are you willing to go?

name: Warship Jolly Roger
description: Jon Munro, ex-officer seeking his family; Alisa Rinaldi, rebel mechanic; Nikolai Kowalski, cunning smuggler; Trace, jailed robotics prodigy. United in a prison escape, they command the Warship Jolly Roger, dodging galactic authorities in an epic space opera game.

name: Weapon Devourer
description: Weapon Devourer is a psychological horror with souls-like and 1930's cartoon vibes, blending subtle puzzles. Battle sentient weapons, consume life forces, dive into the Shield's belly to synthesize might combinations in an ancient world shaped by a mysterious cyberpunk disaster...

name: Way To Fall
description: Way to Fall is a 2.5D game with retro-arcade themes. You must box and use stealth to escape or defend yourself from any threat... alive?.

name: Watch Your Eggs! VR
description: Experience the thrilling world of Watch Your Eggs! VR, an action-packed first-person shooter game. As Agent Pops, your mission is to protect unhatched Frostwing Penguin eggs from wild Icy Land creatures. Plan your strategy, equip yourself with powerful weapons, and face the wave of furious enemies!

name: Mr. Potato Head
description: Mr. Potato Head is a cancelled game developed by Electronic Arts. No details of the game are currently known apart from it's mention on a concept artists resume.

name: Hasbro Toy Factory
description: Hasbro Toy Factory is an unreleased EA game based around various Hasbro board games, including Mr. Potato Head and Monopoly.

name: Battleship
description: A cancelled version of the board game Battleship for the Nintendo Wii developed by Electronic Arts.

name: Aaron Stone
description: Aaron Stone was a Nintendo DS game developed by n-Space and set to be published by Disney Interactive Studios in 2010. The game was meant to be a tie in for the Disney DX show of the same name.

name: Where is Johnny
description: Johnny still hasn't come home. But where is he ? Who is this Voltaire? Fight to discover the truth.

name: WebCraft
description: Webcraft is a claw machine mixed with open world crafting game in space. Catch resources floating by, craft and expand your base from a single square!

name: Weefager
description: Guide this pink being with the power of the ether in a metroidvania where nothing is as it seems. Infuse souls into objects, create minions to help you, and explore vibrant landscapes with a great soundtrack. Shape your destiny on this captivating journey.

name: WiccAtriX
description: Wiccatrix is an ARPG with a spellcrafting system that allows the player to create custom spells to use in combat and to solve puzzles. The elemental balance or the world of Terra has been disturbed. Your goal is to explore the lands of Terra and help restore the elemental order back to harmony.

name: Wildsite
description: An open-world survival craft game for 1-4 players. Crash-landed on an uncharted planet brimming with plasma, you must defend, survive, craft and build your skills to be able to leave this place.

name: Wicked Angels
description: From the studio of GunGirl2 and unloved, another masterpiece by the award-winning game maestro Paul Schneider. Wicked Angels is a gritty, mysterious joyride into unholy cosmic nightmares. Grip what's left of your sanity tight in this descent into the abyss.

name: Whispers of Elysium
description: A former friend needs you to rescue him from an abandoned research station on Mars. Explore the station, engage in interactive dialogues and solve mysteries. What will await you?

name: White Room
description: White room. White light. A white table. And only white intentions. A story that always ends before it begins. But one day the circle will be broken. All you have to do is realise...

name: Xenomycology
description: Xenomycology is a city builder, tower defense, and metroidvania. You control a colony of extra-terrestrial fungus spreading across a planet, and fighting off invading creatures. Xenomycology also offers a peaceful mode if you only want to grow mushrooms and explore the world.

name: Wrestling Manager 2024
description: Take on the role of a wrestling company CEO in this immersive UI-based game. Manage every aspect of your company, from signing talented wrestlers to marketing and promotion. Are you ready to build a wrestling empire?

name: Worldsmith by Charles A. Debczak
description: Worldsmith is a 2D open-world survival/adventure game where you write books to explore unique, procedurally-generated dimensions! Features building, crafting, exploration, mining, and more!

name: Yupi Road 2 World
description: Yupi, the alien, embarks on the mission to save the Earth, helping humans and armed with his power boots, he must overcome the levels avoiding or using enemies to make his way.

name: Zipper
description: A sci-fi realtime strategy rougelike

name: Drift Shooter
description: Drift Shooter is an arcade game. Players control a graphic with a car control feel and collect multiple types of weapons in the scene. By combining and using such skills, they can attack waves of enemies.

name: Kong Fu Legend: God of War
description: "Kong Fu Legend: God Of War" is a massively multiplayer online game (MMORPG). The game provides players with a lot of different quality equipment, and the pursuit of high-level (or best) equipment is one of the most important goals for players in the game.

name: Tsuki no Uroko
description: Set against the backdrop of Lake Mirine, which beautifully reflects the moonlight, this is an adventure story featuring the spirits living in the lakeside town as they embark on a journey surrounding the "Moon's Scale" and the "Secrets of Mirine."

name: Tragedy in Reality
description: This is a plot oriented pixel style visual novel game. In the game, you will play the role of a young graduate who faces multiple challenges from job seeking, work, and life in the complex modern society.

name: Medieval Dynasty New Settlement
description:
Dive into the rich tapestry of medieval life with 'Medieval Dynasty New Settlement', an exhilarating VR game that seamlessly blends role-playing, simulation, and exploration. Set against the backdrop of a meticulously crafted medieval landscape, the player is tasked with the monumental challenge of founding and nurturing a thriving settlement and then starting their dynasty.

As the protagonist your primary focus will be on the challenges of survival, resource gathering, and the ambitious task of creating a lasting dynasty. Utilizing the immersive capabilities of VR technology, you will physically engage in the construction of buildings, cooking, hunting, and cultivating fertile fields. Doing all of this and much more will ensure experiencing the gratification of watching your settlement rise from humble beginnings to a majestic medieval hub.

Venture beyond the safety of your lands to explore the vast and enchanting landscapes, stumbling upon quests, challenges, and hidden treasures that add depth to the narrative. Encounter characters with unique personalities and stories, that will become a part of your settlement destiny

Notably, 'Medieval Dynasty New Settlement' stands as a VR spin-off of the highly successful flat version game, Medieval Dynasty, featuring a fresh map, new quests, and innovative VR mechanics that elevate the gaming experience to new heights.

name: Flying Cat
description: Sin descripción

name: My Little Pony: Magic Garden
description: My Little Pony: Magic Garden is a cancelled mobile game based on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic. Currently only concept art for the game exists online.

name: Decks of the Damned
description: Raise an undead army by night, while by day, fend off human attacks on your lair. Enhance your minions by crafting and looting gear. Discover powerful crafting recipes. Explore lost ruins in quest for rare artifacts. Raid human villages. Shroud the land in darkness under your control.

name: Black Survival: Return to Lumia
description: Black Survival is a Real-Time Survival Game, where you must survive by any means out of 10 competitors in a deserted island. Make split-second decisions with a single click! Immerse yourself in the fierce battle for survival; you do not have a second to spare! Search, Craft, Attack, and Run!

name: Conway
description:
Step into the year 1791 as a freshly enlisted sailor aboard a merchant ship. You've cast aside your former life to chase your dream of life on the open sea.

With an abundance of free time aboard your new home, the choice of how to spend your days rests solely in your hands. Immerse yourself in the lives of your fellow crew members, delving into their motivations for joining this voyage alongside you, and discover the roles they'll play in your life as the journey continues.

Conway is a relaxed, non-linear and (to our best efforts) historically grounded slice-of-life story. There are no epic battles, no destiny to fulfill, and no swashbuckling adventures under a Jolly Roger. Instead you'll find yourself forging friendships and intimate connections with a cast of unique characters as you sail port to port on the high seas.

name: Obama Alien Defence
description: The world is under a huge alien invasion and you're the last hope. Defeat them and gather as many presidential coins as you can.

name: GalaxyWak
description:
Fan games of "woowakgood"
Year-end contest entries for the year 2023

name: Stretchmancer
description: Stretch the world, save the galaxy! In this hilarious 1st-person puzzler, you are THE STRETCHMANCER. Squash and stretch your environment to solve fiendish puzzles and defeat the Claustro Empire in an epic voice-acted adventure inspired by 90s Saturday Morning Cartoons.

name: A.E.
description:
A port of the classic computer game, A.E. (Which stands for Anti Environmental) is a most unusual 5200 prototype. It was never announced by Atari nor was it mentioned in any internal documents. A.E. is an arcade style shooting game in which you have to shoot down waves of evil flying mechanical stingrays in order to save your planet.

The Atari 5200 version only has four levels as opposed to ten that the computer versions boast. The loading times for the levels are also longer due to hardware constraints of the Atari 5200.

name: Space Invaders
description: Sin descripción

name: Panzerkampf
description: Panzerkampf is a team-based 10vs10 players World War II and modern era tank battle game for PC and consoles. You play with historically accurate models of tanks, their armor, weapons and all their parameters. The game includes a full ballistics model with realistic calculations of penetrations and projectile ricochets, an observation/detection and surveillance system, and a physically realistic model of the motion of the tank and its wheels and tracks down to the level of individual track-links.

name: The Last Starfighter
description: A game based on the homonymous movie. It was cancelled on all three platforms, but was rebranded and released for the Atari 8-bit as Star Raiders II.

name: Shockwave Original: Sudoku Daily
description: Daily sudoku puzzles in your browser.

name: Hidden Objects Collection 5: Detective Stories
description: Sin descripción

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Collector's Edition
description: Keep warm with Cartman’s Knit Beanie, enjoy your bathroom time with the Cartman Talking Toilet Paper Holder, or get into the holiday spirit with the Cartman Snow Globe. The Collector’s Edition also includes a select set of tarot cards, the original soundtrack, and the game SOUTH PARK: SNOW DAY! on the platform of your choice.

name: Imposter The Horror
description: Welcome to Imposter The Horror. It will connect you to yourself with its atmosphere and mechanics.

name: Tilted Tennis
description: A competitive paddle and ball game, with a twist! As you hit the ball around the arena, the camera follows it. Spin the ball to disorient your friends and win the match, but take care not to lose track of which way is up yourself...

name: The World Has Gone
description: The World Has Gone—a fast-paced zombie shooter couch-co-op game!

name: They Who Dwell Below
description: They Who Dwell Below is an exploration horror game set within the crumbling ruins of a lost dwarven city. The player is tasked with escaping the long abandoned vestige and along the way uncovering the truth of its fall. But be wary, spirits are not all that haunt these ancient halls.

name: Thin Way
description: Thin Way is an exciting platformer that combines parkour and intense fights. You are an experienced traceur in a world where towering skyscrapers, crowded high-rises, and abandoned buildings create a unique playground for your art. No opponent will halt you and no obstacle will slowdown your path

name: Thousands of Heroes
description: This game is a roguelike where item management is crucial. Since almost all items have a limited number of uses, the choice of whether to use or save each item becomes important. You can also cooperate with other users by sharing dungeon IDs!

name: Vox Battles
description: Get ready for a blast in Vox Battles, a multiplayer mayhem of fast-paced fights and clever strategy. Choose a Vox champion and dive into an arena with up to 8 players, hunt for weapons to survive. With 3 unique biomes, Vox Battles is where casual meets competition, all in one fantastic showdown!

name: Void Inside
description: Void Inside is a first-person psychological horror that immerses you in a supernatural reality. Remotely resembling the human world, this place is filled with horrifying entities incomprehensible to the human mind. Your goal is to survive and maintain your sanity

name: The Void Between
description: When one man's dream holiday turns into a nightmare, it's up to you save him from himself... VOID is an FMV style puzzle game that leads you through a labyrinth of mysterious challenges and puzzling obstacles. Can you uncover the keys that will unlock your freedom, or seal your fate...

name: Vivian and Kyuma
description: A short visual novel featuring elements inspired by the Princess and the Frog with a cultivation twist. Spend time with a cute little snake and have some fun together as you make decisions to determine the fate of a young goddess.

name: Visagens
description: Visagens is an action-focused, 2D side-scroller shooter. Ispired by games like Sunset Riders and Castlevania. Play as Bento, a blind cowboy, armed with a mysterious gun and supernatural powers. In a quest to Cleanse the lands from the demonic scourge of the Visagens and avenge his family.

name: Velkyn
description: Embark on a unique journey and uncover the secrets of the floating island of Vynary and other locations. Velkyn is an immersive open world adventure with a focus on combat, exploration, and puzzles.

name: VHHS: Backrooms
description: VHHS:Backrooms is a psychological horror game with a storyline. The first game in the Volter series. In this part you have to control the fate of a scientist, who got into the world of backstage for some circumstances. His life completely depends on you.

name: Deep Dark Space
description: Deep Dark Space is a 4 player online co-op horror game in space. Investigate abandoned stations to collect evidence and deduce the monster. Beware betrayal from the team!

name: Degu Squad
description: Important personnel were kidnapped by terrorists. When no one dared to come forward, the Degu Squad received the rescue plan. The special operations team of more than a dozen people needs perfect cooperation to complete such an arduous task. Are you ready?

name: Cyber Strike
description: Cyber Strike is a butt clenching bullet hell dungeon crawler. Navigate through intense shootouts, strategic dodges, and cybernetic boss battles. Save a digital world from viruses and virtual foes. Rewrite destiny as you save cyber space in this thrilling adventure.

name: Cooked Out
description: Dive into Cooked Out! Battle in whimsical kitchens as a quirky eggplant. Use headbutts, dodge hazards, grab boosters, and outwit rivals in this hilarious, action-packed party game. Download now for non-stop culinary chaos and multiplayer fun!

name: Corridor
description: Strategically maneuver ships about the 3D space in this unique turn-based tactics roguelike.

name: Code5erpent
description: The game where numbers are a weapon. On a simulated Earth, add, multiply, or combine the numbers which comprise the matrix's code, and take advantage of a rich equipment system of weapons and scrolls in order to come up with devastating combos to annihilate your enemies.

name: Chime Candy
description: Chime Candy is an interactive musical puzzle game that combines the joy of music and learning by guiding fish to their note slots to learn how to read sheet music and various melodies.

name: Chick Road Rage
description: ChickRoadRage is a Top Down game where the player controls a bunch of chickens one at a time, moving them across the road, floating on logs, and dodging cars

name: Chase Ace Sole Survivor
description: Chase Ace Sole Survivor is a skill-based top-down action arcade space shooter with survivor & roguelite elements. Fight off aggressive alien invaders. Put guns, items, skills and strategy to the test. Survive and rid The Planetary Shield of the alien infestation.

name: Cepheus Protocol: Project Fenrir
description: In Cepheus Protocol Project Fenrir, players battle relentless zombie waves as elite Fenrir operatives, mastering Arcade Time Attacks and intense Horde Defense Missions with strategic weaponry and tactics. Dive into exhilarating chaos.

name: Cavy Chronicles
description: Command an adorable army of guinea pigs in fast-paced tactical combat. Strategically attack to manipulate the flow of battle and outwit clever crab combatants. Develop your forces without tedious grinding. Will you daringly rescue your captured allies or abandon them for the greater good?

name: Bullet Race
description: Dive into the world of "Bullet Race," a low-poly arcade combat car game where wielding powerful weapons is the difference between shadowy evasion and seizing control. Race, combat, and dominate in this adrenaline-fueled thrill ride!

name: Bunker Protection
description: You are sent to a dangerous bunker, where the last hope of humanity is located - a serum against the virus. Your main goal is to do everything possible to extract the serum and bring it to the surface to save the survivors from the terrible fate of the zombies.

name: Bottle of Ghouls
description: RogueLike pirate battles! You are a necromancer spirit who uses your powers to restore your former glory and greatness. Move into enemy ships, board them, use an immortal crew, plunder, destroy and dominate in Bottle of Ghoul.

name: Breached
description: Prepare for an enthralling journey as you step into the mesmerizing voxel art world of "Breached." This roguelite twin-stick shooter seamlessly marries the thrill of rapid-fire combat with the nuanced strategy of rogue-inspired gameplay, creating a gaming experience like no other.

name: BocchiField
description: This is a shooter game that parody of BTR(Bocchi the Rock!) Go watch an whole anime, Don't waste your time on this stupid game.

name: Bomber Chaos
description: Bomber Chaos is a platformer where the player controls a character who cannot stand still for long, because when the timer expires, an explosion will occur. It is necessary to collect falling explosive barrels and replenish the timer.

name: Boom-Shaka-Laka!
description: Boom-Shaka-Laka! - is a modern arena-game with a classic twist. You are a miner. The weapons that matter are bombs. Enemy soldiers are patrolling around. Place bombs with a timer. Collect upgrades. Look for a move to the next level.

name: Ball Coin Chapter 5
description: Ball Coin is an action-packed Move and Dodge game. Control Rocky, avoid enemies, and collect coins to progress. With three thrilling game modes, aim for the highest score on the leaderboard!

name: Barter & Blades
description: Embark on a medieval odyssey in Barter & Blades! As a budding adventurer, trade goods, shape your reputation, and amass wealth. Engage in dynamic trading, epic quests, and unforeseen events. Are you ready to thrive in the realm?

name: Battle Shiba Barkade
description: Dive into the Battle Shiba Barkade, a thrilling collection of three unique games, each offering a distinct and exhilarating gaming experience. Free and packed with action, this trio of games is a celebration of creativity and fun, inviting players to embark on diverse adventures!

name: Badaboom: Deluxe Edition
description: A match-3 puzzle game with a twist! Play on multiple maps with unique songs — the more marbles you destroy, the faster you advance through the song. Collect bonuses, chain combos and destroy as many marbles as you can!

name: High School Survival
description: Sin descripción

name: Denpa-tou
description: Sin descripción

name: Himegoto
description: Nevertheless, if you insist on uncovering their special secrets... consider this your warning. You will meet young women, each with their own hidden mysteries, and soon find yourself drawn into a whirlpool of secrets. Oh, do be careful. In this academy, one must never "pry into secrets."

name: Call of Duty: League - Carolina Royal Ravens Team Pack 2024
description: Rep your favorite team with the 2024 Carolina Royal Ravens Team Pack! The 2024 Pack includes Male and Female Home and Away Operator Skins, Camo, Charm, Vinyl Sticker, Animated Calling Card, Emblem and Sticker.

name: Call of Duty: League - Atlanta FaZe Team Pack 2024
description: Rep your favorite team with the 2024 Atlanta FaZe Team Pack! The 2024 Pack includes Male and Female Home and Away Operator Skins, Camo, Charm, Vinyl Sticker, Animated Calling Card, Emblem and Sticker.

name: Brilliance
description: 《Brilliance》 is a 2D horizontal platform jumping game where you need to use jumps, dashes, super dashes, squats super dashes to get through levels.

name: Bright kingdom
description: Bright kingdom - a strategy game with magic and soldiers, where you defend the kingdom from enemies

name: Geometric Brothers: Advance Pack
description:
Make use of each stage's special features, and victory is within your grasp!
Meet the 6 new characters from a rival family, known as the Rival Brothers!
Defeat waves of enemies one after another and earn points!
Increase your score and climb the leaderboards all the way to the top!

name: Up to no Goob
description: Up to no Goob is a reverse tower defense/bullet hell which follows a goblin named Goob. Goob is very hungry and needs to liberate animals from the rather nice evil farmers in order to make himself an omelet.

name: Unknown Memoirs: Stormy Night
description: "Unknown Memoirs" is a short horror game series focusing on distressing tales of horror. "Stormy Night" sets the player in a world where an unnatural storm has been going on for days. As the player explores the world around them, things start to take a turn towards the unnatural.

name: United States of America Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 3
description: "Explore the beauty of the United States with 'USA Jigsaw Puzzles.' Piece together iconic scenes, from cityscapes to natural wonders. Choose your difficulty, unlock panoramic views, and enjoy stunning artwork.

name: Undeads
description: Embark on a risky but exciting journey through the world of Undeads. Search for weapons, armor, supplies and medicine. Survive or hunt survivors. Enjoy unique matches, sell your loot, and fight bloody and challenging battles against the background of the zombie apocalypse!

name: Unilife
description: A survival RPG set in a post-apocalyptic world. Confront waves of enemies, enhance your character and gear, and fortify your base. Explore, gather resources, and tackle the ultimate challenge of survival in this immersive game.

name: Urban Jungle
description: Turn your home into a green haven in Urban Jungle. Find the best place for each plant in your tiny apartment and enjoy gardening without worries. And don't forget to pet the cat!

name: Caça ao Rato
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción
