name: Pernalonga
description: A handheld game based on Bugs Bunny.

name: Patolino
description: A handheld game based on Daffy Duck.

name: Senninha
description: A handheld game featuring Senninha, a mascot character based on Ayrton Senna.

name: Mr Bucket Told Me To
description: The abandoned tools of your existence come back to haunt you in a surreal and terrifying tropical survival adventure.

name: The Aids Avenger
description: The Aids Avenger is an unreleased educational game by Raya Systems for the SNES and PC. The game was made to teach kids about AIDS and HIV awareness.

name: The Respawn Banter
description: The Respawn Banter is an adventure and visual novel hybrid where you are bound to die during your exploration. In the afterlife, the goddess of life’s role extends beyond mere revival: she seizes every opportunity to humor the hero’s demise, making each encounter a one-of-a-kind witty exchange.

name: Northrealm Tribes
description: "Northrealm Tribes" is an exciting strategy game that immerses you in the captivating world of the Vikings. In this game, you take on the role of a tribal leader and delve into the rugged and thrilling era of the Norsemen. Your task is to establish, expand, and protect a flourishing settlement while meeting the needs and desires of your inhabita...

name: RockMen X
description: A Mega Man X-style action game in which Iris plays an active role.

name: Carbrix
description:
Carbrix is a physics-based open-world vehicle building game
where you the player can make almost any vehicle your heart desires

name: It's another hack with Mario in it! Yay!
description:
Help Mario to run and jump over stuff! Oh, and save some baby Yoshi eggs, too.
This hack has custom music and palletes, several simple ASM edits, some altered graphics and an original overworld. The demo contains the first four worlds and 41 available exits.

name: Smash Remix: Spider-Man
description: A mod for Smash Remix (Super Smash Bros. mod) which adds Spider-Man as a playable character.

name: Asha Empire Online
description: Asha Empire Online is a vast and dynamic gaming experience, seamlessly blending elements from strategy, first-person shooting (FPS), and role-playing (RPG) genres. Players initially embark on their journey on the planet Vita Nova, but the game's unique feature allows for interstellar exploration of other planets, space stations, and outposts. Vigilant forces from the empire ensure safe zones for peaceful interactions. In this game, players use Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) to represent their characters, with each NFT offering unique attributes and the ability to be traded among players. The primary goal is to complete tasks, gain experience, acquire assets, engage in battles, and explore. Resource production, organization management, and survival mechanics are key elements. All transactions within the game are conducted using the AEC currency, and owning an NFT character is required for full gameplay.

name: Outlast Mobile
description: Sin descripción

name: Picky
description: Picky is the name of the project which would later be released as Pikmin. Development migrated to the GameCube because it would be able to have more characters on the screen at once. Aside from concept artwork, there are no pictures of the game in this development stage.

name: Kumitantei: Old-School Slaughter
description:
Janus Institute's Class of '89 are trapped and forced to kill eachother 'for science', is survival in the cards?
It's a new murder-mystery adventure game inspired by retro anime, with gameplay ranging from deck-building and tense card battles to classic socialising and puzzle-solving!

name: Dusk Index: Gion
description: Dusk Index: Gion is an upcoming psycho-suspense adventure game from Tokyo Dark creator Cherrymochi in collaboration with Bushiroad Games.

name: Save the Watermelon
description: It's time to save the Watermelon!... or Earth... or the moths... You may have to figure that out for yourself... As seen in the short film "Playtesting a top secret video game" by comedy duo Chris & Jack.

name: Fallout: Nuevo Mexico
description: Welcome to the Land of Enchantment. The year is 2166 - 5 years after the events of "Fallout: A Post Nuclear Role-Playing Game." Every choice made will revolutionize the future for better or worse. Built on the Fallout: New Vegas engine, this free full-on RPG based Modification brings you a brand-new Fallout experience.

name: Head the Ball
description: Sin descripción

name: The 3rd Night
description: The 3rd Night was a short 3D experiment made in Construct 2 (using the Q3D plugin). We decided to give it a shot and made this in around 15 days, just in time for the Haunted PS1's Horrifying Halloween game jam.

name: Summer Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Summer Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Pleased Aliens
description:
Short indie game with a few hidden memes!

Human civilization is in danger! Aliens visit the earth, and you must to please them... You must try hard to please them.

name: Madness Combat FPS: Fueled by Hot Dogs
description:
Use W, A, S, and D to move.
Space to jump, C to crouch
PRESS SPACE AND C AT THE SAME TIME WHILE MOVING TO DIVE!!! You are invulnerable to bullets while you dive, and you'll even get a bonus for dodging bullets
Scroll to switch through weapons in your inventory, or use keys 1, 2, 3. You can hold 2 weapons max
If you're having trouble with the web page scrolling when you try to switch weapons, toggle fullscreen in the options
Press Escape or Q to pause the game and access settings
Press V to pistol whip when you have a gun equipped. I forgot to include in game instructions for it.
Press X to drop your currently held item.
Press E to open cabinets, pick up weapons, and go through unlocked doors. picking up weapons while you already have 2 replaces the currently equipped one.

name: MADFPS 2
description:
MADFPS 2 is an action first person shooter and sequel to it's previous instalment "MADFPSS"
In this game you play as Mike, a detective from a local police department who, one late evening, receives an anonymous tip about a weapon trafficking cartel disguised as a cleaning company, which is filled with dangerous gang members who won't hesitate to stop you in your tracks. In a bit of a ruthless act, you venture out to clean up the cleaners and murder the owner of the place.

name: MADFPSS
description: Ever wanted to experience Madness Combat in the perspective of a character? Now you can! Introducing, MADFPSS is a First Person Action Shooter inspired and based on the Madness Combat series by Matt "Krinkels" Jolly. Developed on the Unity Engine, MADFPSS attempts to capture the adrenaline pumping action of Madness and put it into a game.

name: Bejeweled
description: An unreleased Game Boy Advance port of the game Bejeweled was in development and set to be published by Majesco in 2002, however was cancelled before release.

name: Bejeweled 2
description: A port of Bejeweled 2 for in-flight entertainment systems.

name: Hong Kong Mahjong
description: Hong Kong Mahjong is a classic Chinese game of skill. Your goal is to try to get the highest point value combination by following the Hong Kong scoring system.

name: Ground Zero Hero
description: Wacky action-roguelite survival in a post-apocalyptic wasteland. The prologue covers the first full wasteland of the upcoming Ground Zero Hero.

name: Give Up Robot 2
description: This sequel takes the jumping, grappling and swinging insanity of the original and adds jetpacks, conveyor belts, electrified blocks, lasers, rockets, moving blocks, bosses and more. You will have to have patience and perseverance to make it through the 60 levels in Normal mode and the punishing 12 additional levels in Hard mode. Good luck, and don't give up.

name: The Darkness
description: An upcoming remaster/port of the Darkness (2007) video game, confirmed by Stephen Kick, the CEO of Nightdive Studios.

name: Carrot Clicker
description: Carrot Clicker is an incremental clicker game about farming carrots.

name: Money Mouse in Full Barn House
description:
Money Mouse in Full Barn House is a classic maze / collect-'em-up inspired by the game "Byte Bitten", one of my favourite budget titles from the 1980's.

Money Mouse just wants to spend time playing his favourite games, but family and friends keep getting in the way. "Where's my thingamybob?" they ask? "Have you seen my whatchamacalledit?"

Money won't get any fun until they're satisfied. Find their objects and return them within the time limit to get access to the arcade and play games. But you know the moment the game ends, someone is going to want something else...

name: Origami Solutions
description: In "Origami Solutions," every choice folds a new path in the clandestine world of power, loyalty, and family ties. Uncover the secrets, confront the dilemmas, and shape the fate of Adam.

name: Rat Wars Survivors
description: Rat Wars Survivors was released by industrial noise band Health to promote their sixth album, Rat Wars. It is an homage to Vampire Survivors.

name: Wizard's Beard
description: Explore enemy-infested areas to find items and loot, or kill enemies and take their stuff! Go through strange doors, fight new enemies, defeat powerful bosses, gain unique abilities, and find strong items, all while trying to not die. There are several different routes you can go through, with actions in game and choices in dialogue all affecting different elements throughout the game. Some of which you might not even notice until the end.. Have fun finding all the endings!

name: Xuxa
description: Sin descripción

name: To Die in the Shade
description: A gothic romance visual novel retelling of The Beauty and the Beast.

name: Quiet Rehabilitation
description: Quiet Rehabilitation is a FREE Half-Life 2 single-player modification that tells a different story of Gordon Freeman being taken prisoner directly to Nova Prospekt. In this alternate route, without meeting Barney, he must find a way to escape from this old facility heavily guarded by Combine forces and surrounded by unusual creatures.

name: Shi Kong Zhi Lun
description: Shi Kong Zhi Lun, also known as Chrono Trigger, is a Chinese unlicensed demake of Square's Chrono Trigger made by Shenzhen Nanjing Technology. It makes use of the same engine as Shenzhen's other RPGs, though it attempts to incorporate the active battle system of the original game. Much content was cut to fit what could be fit onto the cartridge, and the game still does not continue past the battle with Magus, who is nearly impossible to defeat.

name: Blood to Bone
description:
An adventure interactive text based story game of royalty and romance!
You can romance up to 4 characters while the story progresses.

name: Checkpoint Gary
description: Checkpoint Gary features a new world space where the player can work as a mercenary, fighting waves of various attackers in the process. In truth, I developed this to cope with the burgeoning madness that comes with waiting for Fallout 4. Perhaps the infinite content offered by this mod will help you as well.

name: Part Time Job
description: Part Time Job is a My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Visual Novel developed by Yumi-And-ZB, also going by Samuel Kingsley. You play as pegasus mare Pastel Sketch, who is going through financial issues due to her artwork not earning her enough money. Looking for a part time job, she goes to the town bulletin board; among several choices she decides she wouldn't be good at, there's an ad for working at a hospital. Turns out it's a mental hospital, run by Fluttershy. Deciding she needs the rather large payment of thirty thousand bits, Pastel takes the job. She'll wish she hadn't. The game is based off of the song Wide Knowledge of the Late Madness.

name: ValueHunt
description: Whether it's a game night with your friends or a few rounds for in between. ValueHunt is a game in which you try to guess the prices against each-other.

name: Lar
description: Lar is a horror-themed puzzle game currently being developed by one person using Unreal Engine 5.

name: The Suite Life of Zack & Cody: Maddie's Snack Encounter
description: Sin descripción

name: Return: Unknown
description: Welcome to Return: Unknown, a survival-adventure game set in a post-apocalyptic Manhattan. Once a thriving metropolis, now abandoned by civilization after the outbreak of a global virus, it offers both challenges and countless possibilities.

name: Grand Theft Auto Tokyo
description: A cancelled game entry in the Grand Theft Auto series that was possibly repurposed from but found in the source code of Grand Theft Auto V.

name: FNaF Ultimate Edition
description:
‎Take the coolest parts from the Five Nights at Freddy's series, put them together and boom- you've got FNaF Ultimate Edition!
With its own story (differentiating from the original series' plot) and some unique game mechanics (on top of the originals you're familiar with), this game is worth giving a try if you're looking for something in the style of Classic FNaF!

name: American Truck Simulator: Missouri
description: Get ready for an epic trucking journey to Missouri in American Truck Simulator! Explore vibrant cities, including the iconic Saint Louis with its stunning Gateway Arch. Missouri's landscapes are diverse and beautiful, from the rolling Ozark hills to charming small towns and vast farmlands.

name: Zeal-X2
description:
Zeal-X2 is a 2.5 D platformer in which you take on the role of Redscar.
Here you can slash your way through enemies and make heads roll.

name: Hell Knight
description:
"Hell Knight" is a roguelike deckbuilding game!

You don't have to fight, just choose and judge!

But don't take it lightly, your decisions will either lead your knight to his death, or make him ridiculously powerful.

name: Jingai Makyou
description: The scrapped version of Jingai Makyou that was released at Comiket in 2003. It differs significantly from the final version and was only ever released as a short demo.

name: Blade Sight
description:
Blade Sight is a single-player fighting game like adventure game. It is a Work-In-Progress title. Take control of Suu and utilize a fast and explosive moveset to combo enemies.

Suu (the player character) has access to a technique, Blade Sight, which allows her to see through an enemy's defense. When her heart gets close to someone, she's able to see through them, allowing her to see a specific move drawn on a card that reveals a move they can not defend against.

name: Battle
description:
Objective is to destroy all 9 of the opponent's tanks.
Men are unarmed and cannot be harmed.
It is possible to reverse the tank.
The cyan man owns the red tanks. The blue man owns the black tanks.

name: Tontie ver.0
description:
This is a kind of evolved whack-a-mole game.
ah, a kind of action game or like that.

name: Gas Hero
description: Gas Hero is a Web3 social and strategy game where players compete for Power, Glory, and Wealth in a unique tree-like world structure. Unlike traditional games, Gas Hero places a great emphasis on game theory, offering richer strategies for players and leveraging decentralized trading platforms to maximize the transparency of on-chain data. It also introduces a highly participatory governance experience, allowing more in-depth player involvement and engagement.

name: Bucks Busters
description: Build dirty tricks, generate ideas, protect them or steal others'. And the strongest will win, because only a great strategist and diplomat can survive in this war! Here, you are the head of the department and you have 5 subordinates at your disposal. The office has 3 more departments like yours. The goal is to defeat competitors by all available means in order to become the best department.

name: Psycho Patrol R
description:
Psycho Patrol R is a mecha FPS hybrid policing and punishment simulator set in the decayed state of Pan-Europa. You play as an officer of the European Federal Police, a V-Stalker pilot of Psycho Patrol, a special unit tasked with solving mental crime, among other things.

The gameplay is a combination of high intensity tactical FPS combat, combined seamlessly with operating your V-Stalker mecha unit to decimate your enemies. The world is open with a variety of different goals to achieve.

Wide variety of weapons, from small arms to 120mm cannons.
Customize your V-Stalker for a massive tactical advantage.
Choose from a wide variety of routes and approaches.
Open, non-linear world.
Unique NPCs to meet and interact with.
Solve the mystery of the Orgone.

name: Toki
description: Sin descripción

name: Toki
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Anniversary
description: A cancelled PlayStation Portable port of Sonic Generations that was cancelled very early in development when it was still under the name Sonic Anniversary.

name: Poker Warlords
description: Poker meets autobattler: Poker Warlords fuses the thrill of poker with the fun of an autobattler, creating a groundbreaking, genre-defying strategy game. Enter a world where each card represents an army and poker hands spring into life to battle for the pot.

name: Stargate
description: An unreleased prototype port of the popular Williams game Stargate. The sequel to Defender and much like the arcade game you fly around blasting aliens and trying to survive long enough to save humanoids. You also have a Hyperspace button that can teleport you to a random area which can be good or bad. Also new in Stargate was an Inviso button that would cloak your fighter for a limited time.

name: Luigi's Mansion Beta Restoration (+) Plus
description: Sin descripción

name: Tricky Super Mario Bros. U
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Galaxy 2: Collectors Anxiety
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Journey Lane
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario Bros.: Lost World
description: Sin descripción

name: Paper Mario: The Origami King Refolded
description: Sin descripción

name: Otona no Onna no Uranai Techou
description: A cancelled Nintendo DS game inspired by the Japan only game Tottoko Hamtaro: Tomodachi Daisakusen Dechu (Hamtaro: Operation Friend), of which would get reworked into the simulator Tomodachi Collection.

name: Ice Scream 8: Final Chapter
description:
In this part of the Ice Scream Row the Kids trying to escape.
But Sister Madelin arrived at her sons Factory and is hunting the Kids too!
Rod has enough!
Rod says: "This hast become personal!"
We won't only See Rod and Sister Madeline, we will See 2 old "Friends" too!
Is it the last time we See Rod?

name: Duke Nukem Forever
description:
Prior to it's 2011 release, Duke Nukem Forever went through various different stages of development. The 1996 build of the game had a completely different style of gameplay compared to other builds of the game, where the game was intended to be a 2D side-scroller instead of a third person shooter.

On December 26, 2022, 4 prototype builds of the game was leaked onto 4Chan by x0r_jmp.

name: Pixelborn
description: Fanmade digital version of Lorcana

name: Meta Revelations: Armour of the Abyss
description: A turn based RPG where you can adapt your armour and save the world! You are Adena Krieger - a cold blooded huntress. Uncover your mysterious past and prevent a calamity that is written in your name.

name: Forge
description: Forge is a deeply strategic map-based card game, fusing the real-time strategy, collectible card game, and deckbuilder genres. Coordinate your units and spells to take control of the map and outsmart your opponents. Discover the cards and find your strategy!

name: Top Duck
description:
Side-view platform game where you play as a duck.

It was seen on the August 1991 tape for Commodore Format.

name: TNT 2: Devilution
description: TNT2 ﻿is a 32-map fan-made sequel to Team TNT﻿'s Evilution that originally began development in 2009. Its public beta received one of the 2023 Cacowards.

name: Instead; Ghost Suburb
description: A mini-adventure game where the goal is to collect certain items in a village and bring them one at a time to the village shrine to open the largest building in the village, which is the northmost building.

name: Swelldone
description: Swelldone is a multiplayer simulation game for virtual paddling and rowing in an open world with realistic wave models. In Arcade Mode, you can paddle or row real world venues on a variety of watercrafts. Get stoked surfing big swells to rack up points on the leaderboard and race against other players and NPCs!

name: CyberVerse
description:
Dive into CyberVerse, a beta game set in the digital city of Cyberia on the Ergo Blockchain. Choose your career, from DJing to bartending, or unwind with activities like gardening and fishing, all while earning CYPX tokens.

But there's more! Level up your character, complete daily quests, customize your apartments, and explore a virtual world filled with exciting features, including a casino and global chat. Scavenge for resources in bins and loot boxes to craft unique items.

CyberVerse isn't just a game; it's an immersive urban adventure where your choices shape your digital destiny. Ready for the Cyberia life?

name: Art Challenge
description: A quiz game of famous painters.

name: Koi Hai Tunnel
description:
The main character, Kudao, was invited by childhood friends Sazane and Tamao. They travel to an abandoned tunnel, rumored to be haunted.

An unexpected situation occurs in the tunnel...?

name: Sonic XG
description: Sonic eXtended Genesis, aka Sonic XG, is a Sonic fangame created by Euan "Sir Euan" Gallacher and Joseph "Nitemare" Waters, and has gone through many different variations in the past. Its most recent build was released on August 17th, 2023.

name: Diam's
description: If someone steals your diamonds... What will you do?

name: TeleCollision
description: A story-driven turn-based RPG with action command style combat.

name: Christmas Horse 4
description: ESCAPE CAPTIVITY. You wake up in the Elves' HQ. What dangers and secrets will you find during your escape?

name: Fighters of Capcom
description:
Fighters of Capcom is a cancelled mobile fighting game by Capcom that started development in 2012. The game was a crossover game featuring characters from various Capcom games.

In December 2023, various prototype builds of the game were leaked online as a part of the TestFlight teraleak.

name: Etsuraku no Gakuen
description: Sin descripción

name: Wilder: Bahadur's Story
description:
In a world where djinn are slaves and humans their masters, can two souls drawn together from opposite sides of the divide truly find happiness? Can they find freedom?

Bahadur has served as your family's valet for many years, and has always been your loyal companion. But he has never known a life outside the city; a life without chains.

You are the niece of an important nobleman and have lived a sheltered existence. Your whole life, you have never truly questioned the way things are.

That is about to change.

Wilder: Bahadur's Story is the second story in the Wilder collection, a series of visual novels featuring a female protagonist, hundreds of choices, two endings, and a romance that breaks all the rules.

name: Bugs Bunny
description: Bugs Bunny is a cancelled game based on the Looney Tunes series for the Atari 2600. The game features Bugs Bunny as he tries to hide from Elmer Fudd.

name: Forlorn
description:
Forlorn was an unreleased 2D platformer developed by RobTop Games in 2012. The game was meant to release for mobile devices, however was scrapped before completion.

Various prototype builds of the game leaked in 2023 as a part of the TestFlight teraleaks.

name: Promise Me, You'll Live
description: A romance visual novel created in four days for the Velox Turbo game jam on Itch. You play as The Crossroad Keeper, the holder of thousands of promises and second chances.

name: Angry Birds Breaker
description: Angry Birds Breaker is an unreleased Angry Birds game. The game was mentioned in the TestFlight teraleak, however no prototype is currently publicly available.

name: Angry Birds Hatchery Island
description:
Angry Birds Hatchery Island is a cancelled game based on the Angry Birds series. The game featured a new mode called Hatchery, alongside the ability to make custom birds.

An early prototype build of the game was leaked on December 17th, 2023 during the TestFlight teraleaks.

name: Professor Bubbles
description: A retro style platformer in 90s style. Be prepared for fast pace, precisely timed jumps, exploration, pixel bouncy pandas and sleep walking bunnies! If you like commander keen flavoured with kaizo mario, then this is spot on your game.

name: Care Bears: Care Karts
description: Sin descripción

name: Rally Rumble
description: Sin descripción

name: Nitro Derby
description: Sin descripción

name: Darts Frenzy
description: Sin descripción

name: Moon Patrol
description: Sin descripción

name: Side Swipers
description: Sin descripción

name: Missile Command
description: Sin descripción

name: Undertale: True Genocide
description: Undertale: True Genocide is an Undertale fan-made game that takes place at the end of your genocide route in the original Undertale. True Genocide is a more story-driven fangame than your typical "press fight button to win" with you having to strategically ACT your way out of battles.

name: Happy Night
description:
Happy Night is a single player experience set in the Postal 2 Universe featuring a unique dismemberment system and wonderful Christmas story. The story takes place at a early date (31 December 1994) & location before the events of Postal 2. Dude need find way to celebrate this Christmas and do not lost place to stay.
Will Dude survive the night? Will he be able to save all that is expensive for him?

name: Pedal Rebel VR
description: Pedal Rebel VR is a adrenaline-pumping cyberpunk motorbike street racing game that completely transforms any exercise bike and any VR headset into an immersive racing experience!

name: Red Metal
description: Drive to survive in Red Metal, a vehicle-combat action roguelite packed with knuckle-clenching moments and wide variety of unlockable customizations. Mow down hordes of enemies. Perform insane stunts. Dodge nuclear strikes. Just another day in the Resistance. Fuel up. Fight back.

name: Kou Dai Guai Shou III
description: A NES demake for the GBA game Pokémon Sapphire Version. This game is the third installment of a triple pack of games, covering the content from right after the Team Aqua Hideout in Lilycove City up to the Pokémon League. This game also features a Battle Tower for those searching a challenge.

name: Kou Dai Guai Shou II
description: A NES demake for the GBA game Pokémon Sapphire Version. This game is the second installment of a triple pack of games, covering the content from the fourth gym to Team Aqua's Hideout in Lilycove City.

name: Kou Dai Guai Shou
description: A NES demake for the GBA game Pokémon Sapphire Version. This game is the first installment of a triple pack of games, covering the content from the beginning up to the fourth gym.

name: Humanity Remains
description: "Humanity Remains" is a gripping single-player, third-person sci-fi adventure. Survive in a post-apocalyptic world, face formidable adversaries, uncover the truth, and make impactful choices that shape the destiny of a shattered civilization. Intense combat and immersive exploration await.

name: Towers and Survivors
description: "Towers and Survivors" combines rogue-like action with tower defense. Strategically build and upgrade towers, manage resources, and use various skills. Each choice is key in this engaging, strategy-based game.

name: Ocean Mirror
description: A lightning fast movement shooter where the ocean surface is a portal to a mirror dimension.

name: Timo Boll Beats
description: Timo Boll Beats is a unique rhythm game that takes place in the thrilling world of table tennis! In this game, you will have the opportunity to hit the ball like Timo Boll to the rhythm of the music, immersing yourself in a fun and thrilling experience like never before.

name: Damned House
description: "Damned House" is a horror game set in a scary, abandoned house. Explore the abandoned house, while trying to escape from very hostile creature and various dangers. There will always be a constant danger of death. Do you dare to explore the house and escape from it?

name: Kanjozoku: Wangan Runners
description: Forged Pistons, Ball-bearing Turbo, Sequential Gearbox, RB26 under the hood! Ignite your passion for '90s Japanese street racing in Kanjozoku - Wangan Runners. Race across 100+ km of open roads, from highways to tunnels and connect with players in a dynamic online community.

name: Am I Explorer
description: Am I Explorer is a puzzle platformer game for single player. The control of this game is very simple. With cute fox, lila, let's go on a journey to find treasure.

name: Pillory
description: A surrealist indie RPG with a unique, mood-based combat system. The angels of Promontory have forgotten about this place. And you are lost at the bottom of it.

name: Touch Screen Backgammon
description: A touch screen LCD version of the board game Backgammon.

name: Goodnight Icarus
description: "It's dangerous out there." - Icarus has always believed in her brother's words. However, she finds herself trapped in an cycle of death on her birthday. Through explorations, anonymous diaries, terrifying monsters, reflection of herself in the mirror... her fate seems to have been predetermined.

name: Raven Go!
description:
Beast boy finds a little alone time, but he got a little too comfortable when Raven walked in.

This is a very short visual novel featuring Raven and Beast boy from Teen Titans.

name: Dandy Boy Adventures
description: Dandy Boy Adventures is a high-quality adult adventure game with sim dating & RPG elements!

name: Youra
description: "Youra" unfolds as a captivating tale of destiny, elemental powers, and the eternal struggle between light and darkness. When Youra and Ichika discover a mysterious key, their lives take an unexpected turn as dark forces descend upon them.

name: Blue Wednesday: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Better Than Dead
description: "Better Than Dead," is a FPS where brutal and realistic gunfight meets the haunting beauty of a photorealistic Hong Kong. Inspired by classic Asian bloodshed cinema

name: Eternal Acid Rain
description: This dystopian world, plagued by relentless acid rain, burdens players with the vital mission. To succeed, we must complete our assigned tasks while evading the ever-watchful AI.

name: Crylia
description: Challenge pilots at over 600 km/h aboard supercharged ships with multiple weapons and upgrades in a new kind of futuristic races. In addition to driving, shooting will therefore be an essential skill to possess to emerge victorious in these muscular races!

name: Break, Enter, Repeat
description: "Break, Enter, Repeat" is a strategic burglary sim set in the Cold War era, where you plan & execute heists in the city of Flumenborg. Recruit crew members, improve your skills, gather tools and intelligence, fence stolen goods, and navigate a city teeming with targets in this indie game!

name: Jinn
description: Dive into the Middle Eastern world of mystery and violence. Embark on a journey to solve an unusual murder case and face a shapeshifting demon who will learn your deepest fears and attempt to break your mind.

name: Interuniverse teleport
description: Defend portals by teleporting soldiers onto the battlefield. Use magic: lightning, fire, mines. Beware of diverse enemies and strategically position soldiers for victory!

name: Grapplers and Space Stuff
description: Grab your best friend and embark on a co-op journey through the lustrous universe of Grapplers. We have hooks, spaceships and lots of fun challenges to overcome.

name: Monster is Me
description: Unleash your inner monster. Rampage with friends or solo in the ultimate rogue-like city destruction game! Smash, level up, and mutate to prove you are the true apex predator.

name: Nasty Platformer
description: Nasty Platformer is a small adventure in a world of endless traps awaiting you at any moment of the game. With only one life, your character will end the game at the most unexpected moments. And the goal of the game is simple - reach the end of the level, avoiding all obstacles.

name: Mage Balls
description: Rise up and show your magical prowess in the Mage Dome! Since the ban on dueling A new game was constructed for the wizard community! Conjure and take control of your elemental orb to battle it out in arenas across the elemental planes in a casual yet competitive game of Mage Balls.

name: Times of Progress
description: Times of Progress is a City Builder set during the Industrial Revolution. Build industries to extract natural resources. Produce goods to satisfy the population. Manage transportation routes by train and ship. Expand on procedurally generated maps and trade with nearby cities.

name: The Paper Arcade: Poker
description: Welcome to "Paper Arcade: Poker Edition"! Get ready to experience the thrill and excitement of one of the world's most beloved card games, right from the comfort of your own home.

name: The Paper Arcade: Pinball
description: Welcome to "Paper Arcade: Pinball Edition"! Get ready to experience the thrill and excitement of one of the world's most beloved arcade games, right from the comfort of your own home.

name: The Paper Arcade: MindField Master
description: But be careful! One wrong move could set off a chain reaction of explosions, ending the game in a fiery blast. As you progress through the game, the minefield will become larger and more complex, requiring even more precision and strategic thinking to navigate.

name: The Paper Arcade: Bombs A'hoy
description: But be careful! One wrong move could send you flying, leaving you vulnerable to enemy attacks and explosions. And as you progress through the game, the obstacles and enemies will become more challenging, requiring even more strategic thinking and quick reflexes to overcome.

name: The Island Souls
description: Embark on a chilling journey to an isolated island shrouded in mystery and fear. In this survival horror game, a malevolent demon preys on the humans souls, Find a trail of haunting notes in its wake Uncover the demon's dark secrets, and ultimately confront the source of the terror.

name: Speck Miner
description: Speck Miner is a small, open-world survival game set in a universe of tiny, procedurally generated planets.

name: Sirens
description: Become a deadly Siren and hunt down the most dangerous sea creatures that have ever swum in the depths of the oceans! Experience a fascinating journey through the world as seen from the perspective of Sirens at various stages of their evolution.

name: Trade Tales
description: A cozy farming simulation meets entrepreneurial adventures. Create your legacy, Immerse yourself in a world of creativity, social interactions, and unexpected twists. Shape your story, build your own brand, and discover the joy of life in "Trade Tales." Your adventure begins now

name: We're Getting Deeper Into The Abyss
description: We're Getting Deeper Into The Abyss is a story game about mental health, all while using the beautiful tone of music, all while characters develop overtime. Players will be able to follow the journey of the main character, Frei Kay, and his mysterious power of his "music."

name: Fire&Fly
description: In this fast-paced 3D platform game, control an AI warrior and improve your combat skills in a virtual world. Use skills such as wall running, sprinting, grappling hook, and bullet time to pass a total of 12 levels of training and defeat the final boss to complete the challenge.

name: Blitz Arena
description:
Competitive Party Game in FPS ! Compete against your friends and players !

Solo, duo or team (4v4), prepare to fight in fast and tactical gamemodes. (Versus, Gungame, Battle royal, Zone control, Runner ...)

name: Tanggle
description: Gather your friends from all over the world and enjoy jigsaw puzzles together. Whether you prefer relaxing puzzling or want to challenge yourself, you can always find something that suits you in our vast jigsaw puzzle gallery!

name: Scrap Age
description: Scrape Age is a free-to-play online game where you and your friends fight hordes of robots in post apocalyptic world, join forces in this fast paced, VR, arena, rogue-like, FPS.

name: Ball Mania
description:
ball mania is a puzzle plataformer game where the player can make choices to see what can be the best choice to survive a challenge some choices will be good others will be bad

you play as little puk a pink bouncy ball that must jump and solve the challenges at ,from the hills to the horizon what are the challenges that await you?

the game uses mouse for choosing and the arrow keys for movement

name: Rifted Worlds
description: A fast-paced Action-RPG that takes place on the floating remnants of destroyed worlds. Discover fragments of your lost world, place them onto the map, then fight and platform your way through the remnants! It's time to uncover the truth behind your world's destruction...

name: Valkyrie Saga
description: Up high on a floating island, Roll the Valkyrie must ascend and subvert fate. Climb, dash, jump and glide up to the summit of the Island, and stop it from crashing to the earth below, in this PSX style 3D platformer.

name: TurnSkull
description: TurnSkull is a turn-based puzzle game in which you collect items and use them to defeat all the creatures in each level. You only have 4 item slots and the order in which you pick up items and engage creatures matters, so think carefully.

name: Heroes of Mavia
description:
Welcome to the enchanted realm of Mavia! Dive into a captivating 3D world that combines stunning visuals, immersive special effects, and a gaming experience unparalleled in mobile. Heroes of Mavia invites you to forge your legacy.
Step foot onto the land of Mavia, where your realm awaits:
Construct your base, fortify your defenses, and ready your army for battle.

name: Detached
description:
A lewd psychological horror comedy dating sim that touches on mental health, illness, and spookies.

It follows the life of Daine, a 25 year old man that is just discovering what it means to actually live, his road to recovery, and discovering himself.

Of course, not everything is as it seems as there are many players out there, both in the Plane of the Mundane and the supernatural, pushing and prodding him down the gentle stream of fate. One of these players is you, the Hand of Fate.

As the Hand of Fate, you will help guild Daine through his daily life, choosing where he goes, and what girls he'll visit to increase their affections towards him. Along the way, you'll get to know their own stories and histories while the world's mysteries unravel before you.

name: Queen's Quest Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Alien Hominid: PDA Classic Pack 2
description: Now even more levels from your favorite developers, The Behemoth. Grab three of your best friends and try out these amazing new levels. This pack contains 100 new PDA levels. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see . There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see .
A 2048 port which runs on the Libretro platforms.

name: Legend Of The Valley
description: Race against the clock, Conquer eight challenging levels, Customize your ride, and master the art of finding the fastest routes. With controller and keyboard compatibility, every twist and turn will keep you on the edge of your seat. Are you ready to prove you're the fastest?

name: Kiosk Simulator
description: Kiosk Simulator is an action-packed comedic take on the hustles of running a big city kiosk and the nostalgia of reaching that lone open kiosk on a rainy late night.

name: Profiler Files: New Orleans
description: As a young FBI agent freshly landed in the field, you will face all sorts of situations and encounter a variety of characters. Your choices, your intuition and your deductions will dictate the course of the story.

name: Spirita Battler
description: A casual fun multiplayer creature battler. Build your own teams by choosing unique creatures, their skills and special abilities! Develop strategies to better deal against though opponents and climb the ladder to the top!

name: Vaporware Odyssey
description: Vaporware Odyssey is a synthwave/vaporwave inspired action roguelike. You are stuck in grid space. You strive to escape to a realm of better vibes. Battle hoards of enemies, collect items and upgrades, and search for an escape from this digital dystopia.

name: VelocityLoop, Zero to Lightspeed
description: Sci-fi outer space 3D racing game. Primarily uses keyboard for menus and game controller for game play.

name: Who am I: Remedy
description: Horror-detective game created on Unreal Engine 5. Solve puzzles, read notes, enjoy original soundtrack, don't forget to pick up the phone and finally, answer the question "Who am I?".

name: Gong
description: A pong clone available on Libretro platforms.

name: Craft
description: A Minecraft clone which is available as a standalone core on Libretro platforms.

name: XRick
description: An unofficial port of Rick Dangerous for PC.

name: Starminer
description:
Design and build an interstellar mining fleet to strip space of its invaluable minerals, and sell them for a tidy profit. But beware. Your greed will attract the alien. Use warships and defense platforms to protect your fleet at all costs - in real space, in real time.

Starminer is a space industry and logistics simulation that strives to be at the forefront of space strategy gaming, blending cutting-edge rendering technologies with deep tactical and creative gameplay. It's set against backdrops of fully-realized 3D environments, where the beauty of space becomes an integral part of player immersion, setting Starminer apart as a visually stunning and technologically advanced space base-building game. Starminer is built with realism and immersion as core design pillars through the incorporation of Newtonian physics for propulsion and movement. This not only adds a layer of authenticity and complexity to the gameplay but also introduces a rewarding learning curve for players seeking a genuinely advanced spacefaring experience.

In Starminer, the universe is more than just a pretty backdrop for exploration and conquest—it's a playground for players to explore their creativity and long-term ambitions for their fleets. Central to the game's creative ethos is the ability to design a variety of space stations that bring them toward their goals; whether it's to mine resources, be a defensive power, colonization, energy production, or something else entirely. The dynamic and customizable nature of these different types of stations means that the player doesn’t only decide what their cosmic empire will be; it will become a unique reflection of their strategic prowess and imaginative flair.

name: Consult Me Before Opening A Snack Shop
description: What, you want to open a snack shop? Better call me!

name: Reign Down
description: A physics based, point-and-click tower defense game where you equip castles with traps to defend your king. Be creative and embrace the chaos that ensues!

name: Super Spelling Ducks
description: Push blocks, build words. There’s just one snag: you’re a duck! Play with your friends co-operatively to make words together in the main puzzle campaign, and then challenge them to make better words in multiple party games! Quack, waddle, and unleash the chaos of ducks!

name: Highschool53
description: "Highschool53" is an adventure game that takes you on an exciting journey with Ahmed, who explores an abandoned school in Saudi Arabia. Ahmed faces complex mysteries and dangerous dangers, all to uncover the school's secrets. Will he succeed in staying and solving the mystery?

name: Spectacle
description: Change your surroundings in the blink of an eye. Wield powerful glasses that enable you to see and interact with the world in new ways. Spectacle is a surreal first-person puzzle game about observation, spatial reasoning, and lizards.

name: Hazard Protocol
description: Team up in this procedurally generated world, solving dynamic puzzles, and engaging in intense top-down action. Choose your controls, face the unknown, and master the Hazard Protocol with your elite squad!

name: Capsule Cat's Big Space Adventure
description: Grab a friend and blast your way through Capsule Cat's Big Space Adventure! Assemble the perfect robot. Slay strange aliens. Narrowly weave through barrages of bullets, lasers and ...tentacles? Test your teamwork with this heart-pumping teeth-clenching action-packed odyssey!

name: Love You till the End
description: Stealth-based game that challenges to navigate the delicate balance between love and fear. Step into the shoes of a misunderstood monster who has fallen in love with human girl.

name: Pathfinder: Abomination Vaults
description: Pathfinder: Abomination Vaults is the first-ever co-op Hack and Slash ARPG based on the Adventure Path, in which players lead iconic Pathfinder heroes into the depths of Gauntlight Keep and battle deadly abominations to reach the evil sorceress Belcorra Haruvex and end her vile schemes.

name: Mana
description: Immerse yourself in the dynamic world of MANA, where strategic brilliance combines with explosive visuals! Engage in intense multiplayer battles, using angles to unleash a dazzling array of shapes and colors. MANA reinvents strategic warfare with a visually stunning and uniquely dynamic twist.

name: Infected Bunker
description: Infected Bunker is a 2D platformer. You have to go through one level after another, destroying enemies in locations. In a dark and gloomy environment, you have to use your ax in battles against creepy zombies and aggressive bugs to survive and get free from this mysterious place.

name: Adventuro
description: Dive into Adventuro, where nostalgic 3D gaming meets a modern twist! Explore vibrant worlds with early-2000s inspired graphics and gameplay in this family-friendly, immersive adventure.

name: Frisia
description: In Frisia you start on an uninhabited Northsea island and are tasked with building a picturesque and cozy village in harmony with the sea.

name: Galvanized
description: A fast paced, movement focused FPS in a foreboding, post-apocalyptic setting.

name: Decayed
description:
DECAYED is an open-world post apocalyptic singleplayer survival game.

Choose your own battles. Come out weapons blazing, using your tactical skills and whits to make your way through the undead, or hunker down and protect an area, standing your ground.

Explore the world with absolute freedom. Stay in the city and loot buildings, homes, or bases for powerful items, or stay secluded in a forest, with the decreased abundance of threats. There are zero restrictions by missions or NPC's. You are your own commander now.

name: Pyramid Schemes and Cults
description: Did you ever want to start your own company and convert it into a cult? Try it now in Pyramid Schemes and Cults a 2D, 8-bit clicker. How big will your company become?

name: Medieval Life
description: 'Medieval Life,' an immersive open-world RPG. Experience the Middle Ages like never before with realistic game mechanics, dynamic character development, and a narrative shaped by your choices. Explore, strategize, and forge your legacy in a historically rich, living medieval world.

name: Augury Point
description: Murder Mystery meets Dating Sim in a small southwestern town beset by cults & conspiracies. Can you prevent your coffee shop from closing, solve your uncle’s murder and maybe even find love?

name: Arena: Gameboy Edition
description: Step into the pixelated realm of nostalgia with the AR3NA: Gameboy Classic Edition DLC! This remastered version takes you back to the roots of the original AR3NA, featuring 100 challenging levels that will test your precision and gaming prowess.

name: Broke Signal Badlands: A World of Desert Adventure
description: A simple choose-your-adventure RPG, set in the desert. You're a line man that's stolen the company truck, in search of enlightenment. Roll your dice, and get into trouble.

name: Ememe
description: Ememe Town, a place where AI NPCs live freely. Chatting, laughing, falling in love... Now, let's simulate the life of your favorite character with generative AI!

name: Meadgard
description: Run your own viking pub in a chaotic co-op management adventure! Grab your friends, axes and tankards, and work together to both serve and fight your hot-headed customers. It’s time to show the world what viking hospitality looks like!

name: Phantom Dust
description: Phantom Dust was a planned reboot/remake game to the Original Phantom Dust (2004) developed by Darkside Game. It was officially cancelled on 2015.

name: Elithian Races Mod
description: Elithian Races Mod is a substantial expansion designed for Starbound, introducing four fresh playable races alongside an extensive array of hundreds of new items, objects, weaponry, armor components, and numerous other enhancements. Two additional outposts have been incorporated, brimming with fresh quests and various merchants for players to engage with.

name: Hiraeth
description: HIRAETH is a sci-fi, first-person survival game set on a desolate, alien planet. Adapt to various threats while discovering the secrets of the abandoned, dystopian colony. You can choose between two distinct game modes that share common gameplay mechanics - sandbox and story.

name: Realms of Madness
description: Command legions of soldiers, unleash mythical creatures, and dominate the seas in this highly tactical real-time strategy game. Develop your fantasy fortress and strengthen its economy before leading the siege. Your battles shall stretch from the depths of the seas to dragon-filled skies.

name: Rookie Guard and the Queen
description: A young soldier, Royd, just passed the exam to become a guard in the palace! While doing a routine night patrol during his probation period, he discovered the dark secret of the queen and his life was never the same...

name: Take Bomb: The Suit Take Off
description: This is an action game in which the player cannot jump by himself, but jumps with the blast of a bomb. You can dash with the blast on your back, and even attack with bombs, allowing you to enjoy bombs to the fullest.

name: TableTop Soccer: Redux
description: TTS is back with another fresh take on strategic and tactical games - skill based goal keepers, physics based kicking, 10 player teams, full steam multiplayer, new graphics, offline play and lots more

name: Streetdog BMX
description:
Get ready for massive tricks, high scores, and gnarly slams in Streetdog BMX. Carve your way through six huge maps featuring hidden spots, handcrafted challenges, and flowing lines!

Customize your bike and rider before hitting the streets to explore six maps packed with wallrides, gaps, bowls, ramps and rails. Uncover new spots, complete handcrafted challenges, and link up your combos!

name: The Ogi: Cycles
description: The Ogi: Cycles is a cozy adventure set in the world of Mullar! Find out about curious places, the terrible storms, meet new friends and experience the unique areas by drawing your way through an emotional story!

name: Trickster Chaos
description: Hack, Slash and backflip your way to victory in a challenging and humorous boss rush game.

name: Tower of the Abyss
description: Explore a fantasy 2.5D roguelike game with a unique lineup of heroes and an ancient World Tree at the village's center. Discover diverse items and skills to craft your own strategies as you journey towards the depths of the abyss. Challenge the end of the abyss in this captivating fantasy world.

name: Untamed
description: Untamed is a planned multiplayer creature survival game that takes place in a post apocalyptic world full of overgrown ruins.
Sin descripción

name: Sonic Robo Christmas Blast
description: SRB1 Christmas (also known as Sonic Xmas Blast) was released in December 1998, during the period between the end of SRB2 TGF's development and the release of SRB2 Halloween a year later, as it was clear by then SRB2 would no longer be using this engine. It is largely a repackaging of SRB2 TGF's existing levels with Christmas-themed names and a winter theme applied. The ability to save the game was not present however, and the game itself would start immediately on load.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2
description: A remake of Sonic Robo Blast 2 (The Games Factory) released in the Sonic Robo Blast from The Past compilation. It aims to recreate the game faithfully, addressing its issues and modernizing its features.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2
description:
SRB2 TGF (or SRB2 The Games Factory) was the first version of SRB2, which was developed between March and July 1998 before being scrapped. Unlike all following versions, SRB2 TGF was still a 2D game, created with the game-making tool The Games Factory. Compared to Sonic Robo Blast, SRB2 TGF was considerably more advanced: It featured monitors, springs, shields, spikes and the ability to spin on the ground. The levels included features such as water, moving platforms and mine carts. Enemy collision was much less buggy and the player could now bounce off enemies and monitors.

SRB2 TGF was later scrapped to be released as the 3D game in the Doom Engine.

name: Sonic Robo Blast
description: A remake of the original Sonic Robo Blast, updating it to a new engine, included in the Sonic Robo Blast from The Past compilation. It aims to recreate the game faithfully, addressing its issues and modernizing its features.

name: Growth
description: Journey to a place where even DEATH doesn’t stop your GROWTH…

name: Gunpunk VR
description: Are you ready to perform for us? Grab your guns, Dive into our dungeon, and Endure the Desires of the Audience. Will you accept their challenges? Or Defy them, and risk their rage? Never forget: "Entertainment is Everything"

name: Orphans
description: Orphans is an adventure, stealth, and puzzle game. Join Victoria in this dark journey through a dystopian city where the most savage instincts stalk in every corner. She must rely on her slingshot skills and agility to be able to free and cooperate with other orphans to survive.

name: Backstage at Naked Porn Battle
description: Welcome to Naked Porn Battle. The most famous glorious fighting championship in the world. There are no rules and any fighting style can be used. The only requirement is simple: Everyone fights naked and the opponents MUST fuck each other.
